title: [Feat]: Introduce Chromium flags handling from *-flags.conf
body:
### Describe the feature

Chromium flags handling from *-flags.conf

### Motivation

Different level Chromium flags handling.
E.g. https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Wayland#Configuration_file

Levels:
1. ~/.config/electron-flags.conf
2. ~/.config/teams-for-linux-flags.conf

These applications have similar handling for this: 
Spotify, VSCode, Chrome, Chromium.

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
